section.heading: Formation of a replacement independent interstate legal entity.

para.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law and pursuant to the authority and subject to the requirements set forth in 49 U.S.C. § 5329, to enable the Metropolitan Washington Council of Governments ("COG") to assist the District in the formation of an independent interstate legal entity to replace the Tristate Oversight Committee as the joint state oversight agency contemplated by this subchapter, the Mayor is authorized to transfer funds by contract, grant, subgrant, or other available means to COG.
The authority under this section shall include the authority to transfer:
Federal funds received by the District for expenses related to the formation of the replacement independent interstate legal entity; and
Any matching funds required to be appropriated by the District in order to receive and spend such federal funds.
Any agreement or proposal to form an independent interstate legal entity to replace the joint state oversight agency authorized by this subchapter shall be submitted to the Council for approval.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90-day) creation of this section, see § 2262 of Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2017, effective July 20, 2017 (D.C. Act 22-104; 64 DCR 7032).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 4 of Washington Metrorail Safety Commission Board of Directors Appointment Emergency Amendment Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-238, Jan. 27, 2018, 65 DCR 819).
